headerDisplay: The **Homebridge Meross** plugin allows you to control your Meross Devices from HomeKit. To get started setup your config below. For information regarding your `messageId`, `timestamp`, and `sign` please refer to our Credentials [Wiki](https://github.com/donavanbecker/homebridge-meross/wiki/Getting-Credentials), and for multi-outlet units see specific model configurations [Wiki](https://github.com/donavanbecker/homebridge-meross/wiki/Specific-Model-Configurations).

refreshRate.title: Refresh Rate
refreshRate.description: Indicates the number of seconds between polls of the Honeywell Home service.

items.helpvalue:
Refresh Rate
Refresh Rate indicates the number of seconds between polls to the Meross Cloud.

Hide Device
Hide Device allows you to hide a device using it's deviceID.

Device Discovery
Enables Device Info Logging, only use if your deivce isn't supported yet.
